statements: SELECT * FROM client_portfolio_info
SELECT client_name, portfolio_value FROM client_portfolio_info WHERE transaction_type='Deposit'
SELECT client_name, transaction_amount FROM client_portfolio_info WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC
SELECT DISTINCT client_email FROM client_portfolio_info
SELECT client_name, transaction_type, transaction_date FROM client_portfolio_info WHERE transaction_amount > 10000
SELECT * FROM client_portfolio_info WHERE client_id = 1001
SELECT client_name, portfolio_value FROM client_portfolio_info WHERE portfolio_value > 50000 ORDER BY portfolio_value DESC
SELECT client_name, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM client_portfolio_info WHERE transaction_date <= '2022-01-31' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT AVG(portfolio_value) AS average_portfolio_value, COUNT(client_id) AS total_clients FROM client_portfolio_info
SELECT client_name, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_transactions FROM client_portfolio_info WHERE transaction_type = 'Deposit' GROUP BY client_name HAVING total_transactions > 10000
SELECT * FROM client_portfolio
SELECT client_name, portfolio_value FROM client_portfolio
SELECT client_name FROM client_portfolio WHERE client_id = 100
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT client_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY client_id HAVING total_transactions > 10000
SELECT client_name, portfolio_value FROM client_portfolio WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'BUY' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT client_name, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_transactions FROM client_portfolio JOIN transactions ON client_portfolio.client_id = transactions.client_id GROUP BY client_name;
SELECT client_name, COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM client_portfolio LEFT JOIN transactions ON client_portfolio.client_id = transactions.client_id GROUP BY client_name;
SELECT * FROM client_portfolio JOIN transactions ON client_portfolio.client_id = transactions.client_id WHERE portfolio_value > 10000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM ClientPortfolio;
SELECT client_name, portfolio_value FROM ClientPortfolio WHERE portfolio_value > 10000;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM ClientPortfolio ORDER BY client_name ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_type FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Deposit';
SELECT log_time, log_message FROM TransactionLogs ORDER BY log_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM ClientPortfolio;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM ClientPortfolio ORDER BY client_name ASC;
SELECT client_name, portfolio_value FROM ClientPortfolio WHERE portfolio_value > 100000 ORDER BY portfolio_value DESC;

SELECT t.client_id, t.transaction_date, tl.log_time, tl.log_message FROM Transactions t INNER JOIN TransactionLogs tl ON t.transaction_id = tl.transaction_id ORDER BY t.transaction_date DESC, tl.log_time ASC;

SELECT c.client_name, SUM(t.transaction_amount) AS total_transactions FROM ClientPortfolio c LEFT JOIN Transactions t ON c.client_id = t.client_id GROUP BY c.client_name ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_id, client_name FROM clients ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT client_name, client_phone FROM clients WHERE client_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase';
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM clients WHERE client_phone = '+1234567890';
SELECT client_id, SUM(total_value) AS total_portfolio_value FROM portfolios GROUP BY client_id;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Buy' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_security WHERE username = 'admin' AND password = 'hashed_password';
SELECT client_id, client_name FROM clients;
SELECT * FROM client_accounts WHERE account_type = 'Savings';
SELECT client_name, address, phone_number FROM clients WHERE client_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT investment_name, investment_type, quantity, value FROM investment_portfolio WHERE client_id = 5;
SELECT client_name, address, phone_number, email FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM client_accounts WHERE account_id = 1001 ORDER BY open_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_type, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE account_id IN (SELECT account_id FROM client_accounts WHERE client_id = 2);
SELECT MAX(balance) AS max_balance, MIN(balance) AS min_balance FROM client_accounts GROUP BY account_type;
SELECT investment_name, investment_type, quantity, value FROM investment_portfolio WHERE client_id = 3 ORDER BY investment_name ASC;
